txt.en: The Taurogrim are a destructive force, poisoning wildlife and destroying plants as they spread. Thorlind has asked you to heal the trees that have been scarred by their ravaging.
'So many trees were damaged! Thank you for doing what you can, [placeholder]. We must find a way to rout this ancient enemy, before they can defile the forest further.'
Thorlind can be found near Tholkát in Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should talk to Thorlind.
Scarred trees can be found near Tholkát in Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should heal scarred trees.

'The Taurogrim have no regard for the natural order. They ravage the land where they spread, destroying the wildlife. We cannot allow this to continue. If you find any trees that show scarring from their brutal attacks, please use this salve to heal them.'
